verbs.description: [V: going] [ARG4: to court] [ARGM-ADV: over carpet cleaning costs] our previous landlord is trying to take us to court to require us to pay for her new carpet and because she said she had to do 70 hours of cleaning in our place after we moved out kelly klein the house minneapolis
